Fairfield branch was reduced in size and colocated with a private nursery

Roseworth Library was colocated into a nearby Children's Centre in 2014

Notes: Stockton Central Library is colocated with Customer Services and other Council facilities

Library name: Thornaby Central Library & Customer Service Centre
Notes: Thornaby Central Library is colocated with a Customer Services Centre in Thornaby Town Centre.

Library name: Thornaby Library, Gilmour Street (Riverbank Children's Centre)
